mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.CATEGORY_CD, B.TITLE, B.CREATE_ID, U.USER_NAME, B.CREATE_DT FROM T_BOARD B LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO U ON B.CREATE_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN T_BOARD_OPEN_COMPANY TBOC ON B.BOARD_ID = TBOC.BOARD_ID WHERE CATEGORY_CD = 'NOTICE' AND DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ( B.OPEN_YN = 'Y' OR (B.OPEN_YN = 'N' AND TBOC.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}) ) ORDER BY B.CREATE_DT DESC LIMIT 5
